description: RAWALPINDI – The funeral prayers of Lieutenant Colonel Syed Kashif Ali Shaheed and Captain Muhammad Ahmed Badar Shaheed, who embraced martyrdom while defending their motherland against the scourge of terrorism in Mir Ali, North Waziristan District, were offered at Chaklala Garrison Rawalpindi on Sunday. President Asif Ali Zardari, the foreign minister, the interior minister, […]
title: Funeral prayers of Lt Col Kashif Ali, Capt Badar offered in Chaklala Garrison

description: KARACHI—On Sunday, March 17, 2024, the exchange rate for one US Dollar against Pakistani rupees was recorded at Rs 278.7 in the local and open market, with a selling rate of Rs 281.4. Note: Exchange rates can vary based on the location and the Exchange Company or bank involved in the transaction. Below are the foreign […]
title: Currency exchange rates in Pakistan today – March 17, 2024

description: The GDP growth rate of Sri Lanka for the year 2023 was estimated as a 2.3 percent negative growth rate, the Department of Census and Statistics (DCS) said in a statement on Friday. Overall, agricultural activities expanded by 2.6 percent, while industrial and service activities contracted by 9.2 percent and 0.2 percent, respectively, in the […]
title: Sri Lanka records 2.3 pc negative GDP growth in 2023

description: China’s automobile exports jumped 30.5 percent year on year in the first two months of 2024, industry data shows. A total of 822,000 vehicles were exported during the period, according to the China Association of Automobile Manufacturers. Exports of passenger vehicles soared 31.5 percent year on year to 686,000 units, and exports of commercial vehicles […]
title: China’s auto exports soar 30.5pc in January-February

description: Non-oil economic activity in Saudi Arabia contributed 50 percent to the Kingdom’s gross domestic product in 2023, the highest level ever, the Ministry of Economy and Planning said on Thursday. The total non-oil economy was worth $453 billion at constant prices, driven by continued growth in investment, consumption and exports. There was an unprecedented performance […]
title: Non-oil activity in Saudi Arabia now 50% of GDP

description: Pakistan Business Forum (PBF) Vice President Jahan Ara Wattoo has said that Pakistan’s agriculture sector has great potential and its current contribution of US $ 03 billion to the economy can be doubled with viable approaches encompassing all the aspects of this vital sector as well as the concerns of the stakeholders. Addressing a workshop […]
title: Viable approaches can double agri sector’s contribution to economy: PBF

description: Pakistan earned $11,145.661 million from exports of textile products during the first eight months of the current financial year (2023-24), the Pakistan Bureau of Statistics (PBS) reported here on Saturday. The exports of the textile product, however, witnessed a nominal decline of 0.65 percent during July-February (2023-24) when compared to the exports of $ 11,218.644 […]
title: Textile exports earn $11.145b for Pakistan in 8 months

description: International rating agency S&P Global Ratings affirmed its foreign and local currency sovereign credit ratings for Saudi Arabia at ‘A/A-1’ with Stable Outlook. The agency indicated the affirmation was a result of the Kingdom’s economic and social reform agenda in recent years. And is a direction that will improve the Kingdom’s economic resilience and will […]
title: S&P affirms Saudi Arabia’s A/A-1 rating

description: Federal Minister for Economic Affairs and Establishment Division Ahad Khan Cheema met Governor Punjab Muhammad Balighur Rehman. title: FDI, local investors should be encouraged: Baligh

description: A delegation of over 20 people from the German city of Duisburg, who recently visited Wuhan, capital of central China’s Hubei Province, said that they anticipated deeper cooperation with the city. title: German delegation seeks deeper coop with central China’s Wuhan

description: With a proven track record in carbon capture, utilization and storage technology, Saudi Arabia has the potential to become a leader in this sector, according to a new study. title: Saudi Arabia can become a leader in carbon capture technology: IEF

description: Foreign Minister Ishaq Dar and Afghanistan’s Interim Foreign Minister Amir Khan Muttaqi on Saturday agreed to continue working together in building on fraternal bilateral relations. “Expanding cooperation in connectivity, trade, security, counter-terrorism and people-to-people contacts is a top priority for Pakistan,” the foreign minister posted on X, after he received a congratulatory call from the […]
title: Dar, Muttaqi agree to foster Pak, Afghan fraternal ties
